Scene:
Kumagai's Cheery Tree
(Kumagai zakura / 熊谷桜)

Play: The Battle of Ichinotani (一谷嫩軍記)

Production: January 1984



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Sakitayū (豊竹咲大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seitomo II (鶴澤清友 (二))
